lenders.name: Marie
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from a large US corporation where I worked for over 30 years.  My last position was as chief operating officer of an investment management subsidiary - where I was responsible for everything but the investing.  Over the years I was in many areas of marketing and finance.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I am donating in memory of friends and family who have passed away, Doris, Eva, Linda, Dick, Bonny, Karen

lenders.name: Billie and David
lenders.loan_because:
We're not passengers on Spaceship Earth...

       we're the crew.
lenders.occupational_info: We help individuals with difficulties in both the physical and emotional aspects of their lives.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: We usually don't get back what was lend out but thru this Kiva program does -- 97% vs (3%).  Where else in the world can a poor person apply for a small capital loan or ...?  Not even in the U.S.  In case u fall into the low (3%) consider as CONTRIBUTION for a well cause.  Kiva's lending program is allowing me to lend a "helping hand" within my limits.  So far all loans have been paid back -great news.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can
lenders.occupational_info: I help large companies to develop its business plans

lenders.name: Carl J. Cogswell
lenders.loan_because: Everyone wants to acheive.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: This is amazing!
lenders.occupational_info: Conceptual video artist, filmmaker.

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: With a little help, many people can change their lives ... I am happy to be part of that help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest newspaper in the United States.

lenders.name: Kerrie
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist. I work for a supermarket chain.I am a supervisor of myself,of course, and three other very talented women.We draw on chalkboards,murals,etc. for the company's 45 stores advertising what the stores offer, sales, etc. I love it very much and consider myself very blessed! My husband is an auctioneer and owns his own business and has been very successful,like I said earlier we are very thankful and blessed!

lenders.name: Gabriela
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university and I conduct research. I am an historian and I love my job.

lenders.name: Justin & Krystle
lenders.loan_because: it changes lives. We are so lucky to be live in such a privileged country and this is one way to give back and help others who don't get the advantages we get. It's amazing to see how this can be a start for someone or an opportunity to expand his or her business. We can all give up a little to change these people's lives.

lenders.name: Patricia Ferguson
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy when women rise out of poverty, through hard work.
lenders.occupational_info:
Retired teacher turned quilt artist.
Passionate about Borzoi in art and quilts.

lenders.name: Ramya
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage the entrepreneurial spirit! I have always admired those who take risks instead of settling for what is handed to them. Money not invested is a waste. What's better than investing in those who invest in themselves? I prefer that to just accruing more money.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: you should have access to the money you need. I am lucky enough to be able to help. Best wishes from my family and me.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a service business in Canada.

lenders.name: Ix.
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give someone a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: Have been in marketing and sales, a college registrar, in corporate admin. Moved back to AZ from FL in 2009 Now retired and I volunteer with various organizations and am a political activist.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me generously, so I want to be a blessing to someone else.  "Pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I tend to about 12 horses on my horse farm daily, plus I hold horse shows on and off of my farm monthly where riders compete.   I also judge horse shows.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: It's good way to feel connected to people around the world and support entrepreneurs

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: it's simply a good idea to participate and make a positive impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a marketing manager in high technology. I market software to customers in the US, Japan and Europe.

lenders.name: morgan
lenders.loan_because: it feels good

lenders.name: Evelina
Dayami and David
lenders.loan_because: every person matters and can make a difference !

lenders.name: Amy in honor of Grandma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help spread the wealth and encourage hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze business financial statements and loan requests to help determine if a business should get a loan.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others in a positive manner.  By loaning money to someone to help them run a business enables them to improve their situation for the long term not just short term.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on large corporate projects.  I am mainly in charge of keeping the project on schedule.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I IMAGINE a world of all people living in PEACE.
lenders.occupational_info: Hello!   I was a concrete delivery driver.  I had a spinal stroke and cannot work any more.

lenders.name: Kata
lenders.loan_because: Many of us will at some point in life need help from a stranger, a friend we yet have to meet.  I have had that opportunity and now want to return the favor to somebody else. It's all about Karma and being part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed and work most days of the week. I walk dogs and take care of people's pets. It's a small business run by me, alone.  I understand the hardship of trying to make it another day...  but I still keep an open mind and giving heart.

lenders.name: Mary and Peter
lenders.occupation: Director of Domestic Affairs & Project Manager

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: Our agency helps individuals with disabilities, such as autism, mental retardation, cerebral palsy,  and epilepsy by following their lives closely and assisting them in finding the supports they may need.

lenders.name: Maryann & Amanda
lenders.loan_because: we admire their work ethic and are inspired by their determination
lenders.occupational_info:
front office assistant in a pediatric clinic
high school jr.

lenders.name: Carlton
lenders.loan_because: YAH has  blessed me with so much. Helping others is my way of sharing his blessings. Plus, it gives me joy to know that I have helped someone to make their lives better
lenders.occupational_info: Providing IT services to hotels across the globe.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea that I can help people without lessening the accomplishment of building their own businesses and improving their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I look for new ways to make computers help us solve problems.

lenders.name: DARRYL
lenders.loan_because: We all should take care of one another. Only then! this place we all call home would truly be a paradise.
lenders.occupational_info: i produce very creative images that tell ones story on television and over the internet.

lenders.name: john j
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege to be able to contribute to this wonderful project.

lenders.name: Dominique
lenders.loan_because: we are interdependant
lenders.occupational_info: fraternity

lenders.name: Tanja Barnes
lenders.loan_because: I know the challenges of running your own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to people through my hands and try to touch their lives in a positive way.

lenders.name: NickandMom
lenders.loan_because: Yesterday, my two year old took time out of his schedule to help a lady pick up her tomatoes.  When she said, thank you...he gave her a thumbs up! I loan because my son is very giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Nurse...I take care of all that need me.

lenders.name: francesca
lenders.loan_because: being lucky by having everyhthing we need for a good life, I believe it is important to give someone else the chance to get a better life

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Neonatal Intensive Care unit taking care of premature and sick infants.

lenders.name: April and Chris
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.

lenders.name: René
lenders.occupational_info: Software development services

lenders.name: HELEN
lenders.loan_because: I BELIEVE THAT EVERYONE CAN USE A HELPING HAND SOMETIME IN LIFE/WHETHER IT BE MONEY OR TIME - THIS TIME IT IS MONEY
lenders.occupational_info: I WRITE FOR AN ANTIQUES TRADE PUBLICATION AND ALSO SELL ANTIQUES

lenders.name: Gary Cottreau
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of these loans because I can help out and make a difference.  What is cool about this is the loan will be put to good use and I have a little say in where it goes. 

Also, the loan is a hand-up and not a hand-out. It can be reused once the loan is repaid and help another family. If I can help the parents with providing for a business, this will help their family members too with the income earned.

Like all economies - this will trickle down to the rest of the community during day-to-day transactions when purchasing supplies and buying daily needs.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people with question about their services, bills, and getting new products. For example: cable television; cell phones; home internet and home phones.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help people in other parts of the world to make a success of their business ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: I organise the payment of employees salaries.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the big financial institutions and governments across the globe often ignore -or just don't see profits- in the informal economies of the developing world.  However informal, these economies across the world are a substantial economic engine for lifting people out of poverty. Microlending allows  people to raise above the cycle of poverty towards self-sufficiency and growth.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the legal department of a large multinational company. I run the day to day activities of the department while the lawyers carry out the legal work.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a clinical research laboratory performing various micro and molecular biological tasks.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone else make their dreams come true, to empower them and to enrich their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: difficult, sell advertising to the automotive industry in Florida.

lenders.name: Sid
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all can use a helping hand and my God has been good and merciful to me and I should be likewise to my fellow man.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory doing a variety of mechanical and electrical repairs.

lenders.name: Matt and Karen
lenders.loan_because: We love to travel and are happy to have a way to help develop some of the places we've visited.  Also, it's a lot better than just donating the money.

lenders.name: Jazuli
lenders.loan_because: To give a privilege to the under privileged, InshaAllah
lenders.occupational_info: Honest, hard working

lenders.name: Dahlia
lenders.loan_because: a change starts with you...

lenders.name: tracy and michael
lenders.loan_because: we have so much and think it is very important to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm a banker and my husband is a graphic designer.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I need help once and was given the opportunity; therefore, I must pass on the act of kindness to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I choose a noble field - Medicine- which brings such a joy by helping others.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: We believe that if someone has a dream they should try to fulfill it and  if we can help that person achieve that dream or vision by a monetary loan then we are all for it.
lenders.occupational_info: Rob helps customers understand the value of our database platform.  He also writes technical books.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I saw this on TV and realized that helping other people provide for their families was a better way to use my money than blowing it on things we don't need. My husband and I are blessed to have good jobs and enough money to provide for our family (even though we struggle sometimes) and I love the idea that I am helping others to achieve the same blessing. I believe that these men and women are working hard to improve their lives and I am happy to contribute to that!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach reading and writing skills to 12 year old children. I love my job. My husband services air conditioners and heaters.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: To give back what I have been fortunate to earn.
lenders.occupational_info: My firm helps corporations educate their employees to provide customers an excellent interaction.

lenders.name: Mohit
lenders.loan_because: its a wonderful thing to do.

lenders.name: Happy Moose
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky and like to help others.

lenders.name: Team Spiers
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Bat Benevolence
lenders.occupational_info:
The plants and animals that live around us have stories.  I like to learn those stories and share them with people of all ages. 

I also write, draw, play music, free-lance graphic design, and design web sites.

lenders.name: Scott and Kara
lenders.loan_because: While we don't have a lot of spare money to donate to charity, the money we do have really makes a difference to the business owners that we loan to.  Plus, we like the personal connection that you get through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband owns his own business doing systems engineering consulting work.  I stay home with our two beautiful children; I was previously employed as a software engineer.

lenders.name: Lise
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it's the right thing to do.  It's great to be able to lend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in market research.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I feel I'm very blessed with a happy, healthy family. I feel if everyone would help someone in need, the world would be a much better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother of three , with a wonderful husband that provides for the family ,so I could be home to raise our children.

lenders.name: connie
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give then to recieve
lenders.occupational_info: A drop of water in the ocean of life

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I am an contractor and understand what that sometimes business persons need help and shouldn't have to play politics to get that help.  I ENJOY helping others.  I enjoy hearing about my 'friends' progress.  I would like to see updates months after the loan has been completed.
lenders.occupational_info: I contract with a company to deliver trailers to dealerships around the US and Canada.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate to have a great support system and wanted to be able to provide support to others across the globe.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Director of Manufacturing for a Wood and Wood Products Company. Our manufacturing includes products for the door and window industries.

lenders.name: Robert Barbie James Ellie Emma Jesse
Durwood
lenders.loan_because: I don't have a lot, but I have enough and more. My simple life is embarrassingly comfortable, when compared to most people in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I have seen what a big impact such small loans can have for entrepreneurs and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Management Officer at U.S. Embassies

lenders.name: Stephan
lenders.loan_because: it is often the little things in live that can make the most profound difference

lenders.name: Aimee and Anne
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a better place for all and to do our part to contribute to the greater good.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people and building gardens

lenders.name: Darryl
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I use technology to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: What little I can do can help others around the world, more people need to give.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I want to try to make the world a better place!

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: It brings a smile to my heart to play a small part in encouraging and supporting other entreprenerial spirits, while at the same time feeling like we're erasing borders that segregate land into countries, but rather supporting one world under one God.
lenders.occupational_info: I have always been happiest doing my own thing, having my own business, working from my home.  I've been a gift basket designer, designed lawn signs to announce babies, written romance novels, and now, for an income, I am taking other peoples' dogs into our home while they are on vacation so that they don't have to put their beloved pets in a kennel.

lenders.name: Sherman
lenders.loan_because: I feel GIVING will help develope my businesses during the off season, because my work is seasonal, so I have to create other thing to do when the season is slow...call 1-888-834-9865 or 1-800-507-7222 code#CL3939
lenders.occupational_info: I work for AFL-CIO Union 835 Orlando, Florida which brings in ALL CONVENTIONS into the Orlando Orange County Convention Center, and hotels like the Walt Disney World Swan and Dolpin.  I help lay the carpet, build the booths, and take the CONVENTION SHOWS down when the SHOWS are over!

lenders.name: Galit
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My work requires me to spend most of my time sitting in front of a computer.  Since I am a consultant, I am at a different business every day and some days I work at my home office.

lenders.name: Amanda and Marc
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help make a difference... even if it's just one baby step at a time.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate in my life and want to share with others who may not have the same opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major petrochemical company as an analyst.

lenders.name: LouAnn
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with 3 to 5 year old children in a public school preschool program. My job is to help these kids develop speech and language skills. In other words I'm a Speech Language Pathologist

lenders.name: Robin Locke Monda
lenders.loan_because: It is a form that allows for perpetual giving, within a limited budget.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people communicate better, by making their web pages, their advertising and their books attractive and easy to understand.

lenders.name: Tom and Glenda
lenders.loan_because: this is an excellent way to help people to become self-sufficieint.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world by helping people who want to work get the opportunity to build towards their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an office worker who helps manage medical programs for the U.S. Air Force

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.loan_because: I think it's great people from poorer countries are not regarded as just victims. And I also think it's great to be a bussinesspartner!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneuring can be  fun, profitable and a way to succeed in life.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.occupational_info: Firefighter/Paramedic

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. Helping out hardworking, honest entrepreneurs just makes sense and is my way of giving somebody an opportunity to improve their life. I like Kiva because it allows help someone specific, something you can't see happen with a regular charity.
lenders.occupational_info: My work allows me travel and see other cultures, people and places. Those lessons are far more rewarding than my actual work.

lenders.name: barb
lenders.loan_because: i believe in assisting people to become self-sufficient and an important part in enhancing their community
lenders.occupational_info: factory worker

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: A way to help a larger global community.
lenders.occupational_info: Education and exploration

lenders.name: Kathy & Kids
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance,  and if what little i can lend will help someone then it was all worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the proud mother of 3 awesome kids!  I look forward to helping a many Kiva persons as possible.

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped to suceed through the gifts and loans of others, so I know it works!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the day to day operations of an A/C company by scheduling, billing, recording information and finding solutions to problems.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I've been very poor, and have been blessed to in a position to be able to help others. I feel this is a wonderful way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw and paint pictures, and make beads with glass and a propane torch.

lenders.name: Rochlani Family
lenders.loan_because: Life lived for others is life indeed; Life lived for self is a barren waste.
lenders.occupational_info: I meet business people who have lots of work to do but very little time to do it. I understand their needs and then work with technical folks who program computers to get the same work done faster and better.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: It take a village,right. With Kiva,the world is our village.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.occupational_info: I help musicians market their music and connect with their fans.

lenders.name: The Burkhart's
lenders.loan_because: Its very gratifying to give to others and know it will improve their life and that of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Dianne oversees the operations and lending departments of TLC Federal Credit Union. Carl works in distribution for NW Natural Gas. David & Aaron are college students.

lenders.name: Jose Sola
lenders.loan_because: where else can you do so much with so little?

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: not helping when you can is just the saddest statement you can make about yourself

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I started a business without having capital and also under the cloud of a 2.5 yr.  frivilous lawsuit by a competitor using the legal system to try and put me under. Hard work and ingenuity are only a leaping off point but funding is essential to a person's perserverence where ever that may come from. When it happens, the sun breaks through and your vision becomes crystalized.  I loan because I wanted my reach to be more global and soon my own business will do just that.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Eleanor Group is a spa & wellness marketing company that matches local people with local services through fundraising with schools & non-profits. We help day spas use their service dollars in place of their marketing dollars to effectively bring in more new local clientele. So those supporting the fundraiser get great discounted services, the spas get grateful new local people and get to support their community and the fundraising organization raises money quickly and easily. 

Everyone wins!

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to help out women who want to better themselves and their living situation by creating their own business thus helping them build self-worth and pride in themselves.

lenders.name: chastity
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great thing that I can do to make a difference for someone less fortunate than I with just a little bit of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive to clients homes and professionally groom their pet right in their own home.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Supporting the dreams of others is just as important as following your own.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of helping those who are trying to make something of themselves to accomplish that goal.
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired I raised corn and soybeans on a farm in Illinois.

lenders.name: Joe and Steve
lenders.loan_because: It just feels great.  Go ahead - help open the doors http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Ti0qV5pbJM

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I understand that sometimes just a little can do so much.

lenders.name: CINDY
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have the chance to support themselves, and this is an affordable way that I can do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a customer service representative at a bank.  I help people decide what kind of account they need and open it for them.  If they have problems with their banking I help them find the solution.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I hope that those in need know that there are people who compassionately care for them.  I'm beyond blessed, and I want to bless others with what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a physician, hopefully to work with Latino populations either in the States or in Latin America, with an emphasis on preventive medicine. In addition to México, I have lived in Asunción, Paraguay, and Jinotega, Nicaragua, and have traveled throughout Latin America.  These three countries and their people, however, are especially dear to my heart.

lenders.name: Inguna
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a New York based designer and I work  mostly for web.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he can eat for a day, give a man a fishing rod.........

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are all one and that I can make a little difference in the world for someone then I am doing my part
lenders.occupational_info: Growing plants for others to enjoy

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach four year old children. I teach early reading and writing, math skills, and social skills.

lenders.name: Patrice
lenders.loan_because: I believe the way to world peace is through giving everyone the chance to provide their families a good life .

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It' the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to those in need in my global community.  When I see all that I have it makes me want to share and change the lives of someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I have become medically disabled and so I have retired from my job of managing a 124 unit apartment community.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help women in need who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with school aged children with disabilities to reach their potential and become independent, with academics, socially and emotionally.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: Because I've had wonderful opportunities and experiences in my life, I want to give back.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: There are entrepreneurs all over the world and to have the ability to enable others is an opportunity not to be missed
lenders.occupational_info: working with others to get the best out of their investments in technology (computers and related applications).

lenders.name: Vera and Russ
lenders.loan_because: I support micro economics because I feel that it is human nature to desire self sustenance and so many individuals in the world do not have the opportunity to experience this simply by virtue of circumstance.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I want 100% of the money going to the individuals or community and not to sustaining or perpetuating corporate charities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with inner city students from cultures around the world. I provide opportunities for them to discover their talents beyond academics by integrating dance, drama and film making in to their educational experience.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Shera
lenders.loan_because: I know first hand as a board member and volunteer of a non-profit organization here in New York  that every little thing we can do makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: To earn a living I am in Human Resources but my passion is in the non-profit world.  I work with a group of women who deliver a program called "Circle of Woman" to woman at risk recovering from homelessness, addiction and abuse.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that are trying hard to make a better life for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I design  electronics communications systems.

lenders.name: Nicole & Chad
lenders.loan_because: It will give someone else a chance to provide for their family... Hard work should be rewarded...
lenders.occupational_info: Chad is a self employed commercial fisherman who sells to fish houses in South Florida. Chad loves his job and is fortunate enough to make a good living doing what he loves. I was blessed enough to be able to go to law school and now love what I do.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being of service to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I do gourd artwork as well as intuitive readings.

lenders.name: Amy & Yoly
lenders.loan_because: God has richly blessed us.

lenders.name: maura
lenders.loan_because: i believe in paying it forward

lenders.name: richard
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to help
lenders.occupational_info: I Install sewer and water systems

lenders.name: Lend-a-hand
lenders.loan_because: My beer money can make a difference. Who knew?

lenders.name: JULES45
lenders.loan_because: Fifteen years ago I was a woman with a vision.  Getting a financial institute to loan me money was impossible.  I had no retail experience only a vision. I  wanted to help as many dog and cat owners in my community to understand the benefits of feeding a better nutritionally sound diet to their four legged loved ones.  My business is now very successful finacially and educationally.  I want to share as much as I can to woman with their own visions.  Empowering woman to move forward in business is healthy to any economy and I want to be a part of that.  JULES

lenders.name: Anne

lenders.occupational_info: I help companies put procedures and practices in place that help them stay in business longer

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because: I like to support the entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Working to find a cure for cancer.

lenders.name: Karyn
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  As a nurse, wife, and mother it feels right to continue to care for people farther than my arms can reach.  We all have dreams, I am so thankful that I am able to help someone else's come true.

lenders.name: Marsha
lenders.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate people in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a school library.  Every day, young students come with their classes and with their parents to read and check out books.  Students at my school love books, and love stories.  All of us have stories!

lenders.name: REGINA M.
lenders.loan_because: I care about others who struggle to make a decent living.

lenders.name: Luanne
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and document computer desktop standard installations at a community college in New Mexico.

lenders.name: A. Traveling Bear
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to live their dreams.

lenders.name: Rosanna M.
lenders.loan_because: when I help others realize their potential, I am realizing my own potential to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: As a leadership coach and organizational consultant, I help individuals and teams make a difference with  their talents. I believe the human spirit is a cauldron of possibility and we each play a part in helping the possibility become a reality.

lenders.name: Niesha
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to make a difference !

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: Finally, there's a way to reach out  person-to-person, give tangible hope and support, and together create a better world.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I am a businessman myself and know how hard it is to raise the money. I want to help someone who is going through the process of funding a business.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is my life. I am trotting the glob in the search of the best. My interests are human sexuality and history.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: If everyone does a little.. ..it adds up to a lot!  The loan is a hand up not a hand out.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the capacity of micro-loans to make a significant difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: a small amount can change someone's life!

lenders.name: Carren
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others as much as I can. I wish I could do more.
lenders.occupational_info: I help educate physicians about my medications and disease states to improve patients lives.

lenders.name: Buffalo Bill Johnston
lenders.loan_because: The world of food, shelter, and entertainment deserves everyone's small push. "Pay it forward!" Thanks to wikipedia, thanks to google, and thanks to kiva, the world is growing into a smarter better place.
lenders.occupational_info:
Owner, Johnston's Furnished Rooms and Studio Apartments, month-to-month rentals in Buffalo, NY USA, Phone us tonight and check in with Paypal.

Visit Niagara Falls NY, just 21 miles north of Buffalo NY, 20 million annual visitors! Visit the Buffalo Zoo, 400,000 annual visitors!  Buffalo airport code BUF.

lenders.occupational_info: I am on staff at a church in Long Beach, California.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: chris & holly
lenders.loan_because: Just simply because we like helping people.  I've been to some of the poorest places in the world and it has completely changed my outlook and made me realize how fortunate I am to live where I do and live the kind of life I live so I donate to give other people that chance too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a library assistant working for the Muskegon Area District Library.  My husband is a cable guy.
